//=====================================================================================================
//= Shopping mall
//=====================================================================================================
//= Map and shops created by ElectronicDesign
//==== Credits ========================================================================================
//= Borf for creating Browedit
//= ~Annieruru~ for helping me create the coin shop
//==== Version ========================================================================================
//= 1.0
//===== Compatible With ===============================================================================
//= eAthena SVN
//==== Description ====================================================================================
//= Just a set of shops to be released with the Mall map I created, everything found in these shops
//= are basic items that can be purchased anywhere else, with only a few exceptions, for example the
//= Pet Shop and a few katars. Safe for use in a mid to SHR server. Also, the Coin shop included is one
//= that I released a little bit ago, the topic can be found here:
//= http://www.eathena.ws/board/index.php?showtopic=240654
//= In order for it to work you must add the rest of the info in that topic, and remove the /* */lines
//==== Changelog ======================================================================================
//= 1.0  First Release
//=====================================================================================================
